---
name: AdBlockID Plus (Badware risks) v24.11.2-17
---
# example.com/path-2/
# https://regex101.com/r/m9B31Z/4
/(\.[a-z]{2,3}\/)([a-z0-9-]+)(-[0-9]{1,2}\/)$/
# example.com/?menyala=KAWANFILM21
# https://regex101.com/r/rr7MHE/12
/(\/\?(?!api|page|halaman|view|search)[a-zA-Z0-9_]{3,}=)([a-zA-Z0-9%+-]{5,})$/
# example.com/?id=togel+4d
# https://regex101.com/r/I3hYSd/2
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6744587/simple-regex-match-any-string-with-at-least-one-hyphen
/(\.(?:id|nl))(.+)?(\/\?id=)([a-zA-Z0-9]*(?:\+|-)[a-zA-Z0-9]*)+$/
# /?coin= | Melengkapi di atasnya, karena keterbatasan harus minimal 2 kata
# https://regex101.com/r/g88LAj/3
/\/\?(?:id|panel|coin|xlost|403_id|srsltid)=/
# .php?done=IDLIX+21
# https://regex101.com/r/FKNSfw/3
/\.php\?([a-z]+)=([a-zA-Z0-9]*(?:\+)[a-zA-Z0-9]*)+$/
# .id/id/tag/ben-can-you-hear-me4ccba682-3f7c-4dc1-9e31-9cd80eec6db7.html
# https://regex101.com/r/s1ioqo/1
/\.id\/.+([a-z0-9]{8})-([a-z0-9]{4})-([a-z0-9]{4})-([a-z0-9]{4})-([a-z0-9]{12})\.html/
# mashumana.es/13893084-xvideo.html
# https://regex101.com/r/0BAV5I/1
/\.(es|fr)\/([0-9]{8})-.+\.html/
# rpsyche.de/jclpackt-32631.html
# https://regex101.com/r/UPZzPE/4
/\.(de|fr|za)\/([a-z]{6,11})-([0-9]{5})\.html/
# domain.go.id/image/*
# https://regex101.com/r/2w7Pqc/latest
/(\.id\/(?:image|assets|wp-admin|wp-content|wp-includes|wp-data)\/)/
# https://example.com/skctpj-24231.txt
# https://regex101.com/r/cMsooA/2
/\.(de|pl)\/([a-z]{4,6})-([0-9]{5})\.(fb2|[a-z]{3,4})/

/\.com\/film-semi-/
# example.com/nonton-
# https://regex101.com/r/iZC5nE/latest
/\.(ar|bar|ca|cl|fr|in|iq|nl|za)\/(aplikasi-|download-|link-|streaming-)?(nonton|drama|drakor|bokep|bandar|film-semi|foto)-/
/\.(ar|bar|ca|cl|fr|in|iq|nl|za)\/(situs-|aplikasi-|web-)?(komik|cara|baca|manhwa)-/
# https://regex101.com/r/iYXKub/latest
/\.(ar|bar|ca|com\.co|cl|fr|in|iq|nl|za)\/(aplikasi-|film-|(?:(?:alamat-|link-)(?:situs-)?)|web(?:site)?-|www-)?(01nonton|bioskop(?:-)?88|bioskop(?:-)?keren|cgvindo|dewa(?:-)?nonton|drakorindo|dramaindo|dramaqu|dunia(?:-)?film|dutafilm|dutamovie|filmapik|ganool|gudangfilm|gudang(?:-)?movies|indoxxi|juraganfilm|(?:vip-)?idlix|kawanfilm|kawanmovie|kebioskop|kios-film|layarindo|layar(?:-)?keren|ngefilm|nontonfilm88|oppadrama|rebahin|sobatkeren)(21)?(-|\/)/
# https://regex101.com/r/RrwtHY/latest
